wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth John Thompson (born 1 March 1945) was an English professional footballer who played as a half-back in the Football League for Ipswich Town and Exeter City, and in non-League football for Yeovil Town.

response: Kenneth, or Ken Thompson, or Kenny Thompson may refer to:
*G. Kennedy Thompson (born 1950), also known as Ken Thompson, American businessman; Wachovia Corporation
